shorts.title_distilled: Ad Campaign Targets Vulnerable Republican Who Broke Promise Not to Cut Medicaid.
shorts.description: A new ad campaign is targeting a vulnerable first-term Republican congressman in a Northeastern Pennsylvania swing district after he broke his promise not to vote for Medicaid cuts.Rep. Rob Bresnahan Jr. (R-Pa.) joined the rest of his party last week to vote …
shorts.content: A new ad campaign is targeting a vulnerable first-term Republican congressman in a Northeastern Pennsylvania swing district after he broke his promise not to vote for Medicaid cuts.Rep. Rob Bresnahan Jr. (R-Pa.) joined the rest of his party last week to vote …
shorts.content_distilled: new ad campaign is targeting a vulnerable first-term Republican congressman in a Northeastern Pennsylvania swing district after he broke his promise not to vote for Medicaid cuts.

shorts.title: Jazz in the streets: Scranton Jazz Festival celebrates 20th year
shorts.title_distilled: Jazz in the streets: Scranton Jazz Festival celebrates 20th year.
shorts.description: For three days at the start of August, the city of Scranton will come to life with the sound of jazz once more. The 20th annual Scranton Jazz Festival will take place all over downtown Scranton from Friday through Sunday, Aug. 1-3, filling the streets with jazz, blues and world music.
shorts.content: For three days at the start of August, the city of Scranton will come to life with the sound of jazz once more. The 20th annual Scranton Jazz Festival will take place all over downtown Scranton from Friday through Sunday, Aug. 1-3, filling the streets with jazz, blues and world music.
shorts.content_distilled: For three days at the start of August, the city of Scranton will come to life with the sound of jazz once more.
